sessionStarted.title: Session Started
sessionStarted.body: You session on the charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}' has been started successfully

ocpiPatchChargingStationsStatusesError.title: OCPI - Patch Status Failed
ocpiPatchChargingStationsStatusesError.body: The transfer of the Charging Station's statuses has failed on location '{{location}}', check the logs

smtpAuthError.title: Email Server Authentication Error
smtpAuthError.body: The authentication to the primary email server has failed, check the configuration

optimalChargeReached.title: Optimal Charge Reached
optimalChargeReached.body: Your electric vehicle, which is connected to '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}', reached its optimal charge (85%)

endOfCharge.title: Charge Finished
endOfCharge.body: Your electric vehicle, which is connected to the charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}', has just finished charging

endOfSession.title: Session Finished
endOfSession.body: Your session on the charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}', connector '{{connectorId}}' has just finished

unknownUserBadged.title: Unknown User Badged
unknownUserBadged.body: An unknown user has just badged on '{{chargeBoxID}}' with the badge ID '{{badgeID}}'

chargingStationRegistered.title: {{chargeBoxID}} just Connected
chargingStationRegistered.body: The charging station '{{chargeBoxID}}' just got connected to the central server

userAccountStatusChanged.title: Account {{status}}
userAccountStatusChanged.body: Your account has been {{status}} by an administrator
